LanguageData.HAR_NM_A_a.label: Spiritual Armor
LanguageData.HAR_NM_A_a.description: An advanced version of the Night Demon's Cursed Armor. It is said to originate from the time of the Creator.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_A_b.label: Laila Tunica
LanguageData.HAR_NM_A_b.description: Resembles the dress of a Sister of the Church of Areteia. While it doesn't provide the same level of protection as proper armor, it increases movement speed by using the Nearmare's telekinetic powers.
